name: Bedform Spacing Ratio (Ls/Wbf)
functionStatement: Bedform sequences (rifflepool/steppool) create exchange zones and enhance hyporheic flow.
descriptionMarkdown: Characteristic bedform spacing (Ls) normalized by bankfull width (Wbf). Lower (within expected) is better; high values indicate uniform runs.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Map bedforms; measure spacing between repeats (e.g., pool-to-pool); divide by Wbf; compute reach median.
